title: BRIEF-Attis Oil And Gas Says Petroteq Recommenced Production From Asphalt Ridge Facility
text:
BRIEF-Attis Oil And Gas Says Petroteq Recommenced Production From Asphalt Ridge Facility

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 24, 2019 09:21)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Attis Oil And Gas Says Petroteq Recommenced Production From Asphalt Ridge Facility Sept 24 (Reuters) - Attis Oil and Gas Ltd : * ATTIS OIL AND GASLTD - UPDATE ON INVESTEE COMPANY: PETROTEQ * ATTIS OIL AND GAS LTD - PETROTEQ RECOMMENCED PRODUCTION TODAY FROM ASPHALT RIDGE FACILITY IN UTAH
